title: Smart Watering System
description: Led the development of an automatic plant watering system using moisture sensors and IoT integration to optimize irrigation based on soil condition.

title: Linefollower Robot
description: Designed and built an autonomous line follower robot using infrared sensors and PWM motor control. The system was able to detect and follow black tracks on white surfaces with real-time correction logic for turns and intersections.

title: Contactless Attendance System with Body Temperature Monitoring
description: Built an attendance system with face detection and temperature monitoring using Raspberry Pi and GY-906.
